thread.title: Ariel Winter just showed us her first swimsuit of 2017, and it’s minimalist perfection
thread.title_full: Ariel Winter just showed us her first swimsuit of 2017, and it’s minimalist perfection

author: Johnni Macke
title: Ariel Winter just showed us her first swimsuit of 2017, and it’s minimalist perfection
text:
Ariel Winter just showed us her first swimsuit of 2017, and it’s minimalist perfection All hail Ariel Winter and her amazing swimsuit style ! The 18-year-old star just showed us her first bathing suit of 2017 and it’s a minimalist’s dream.
While most of the country is dealing with storms, snow and freezing temperatures, Winter is rocking swimsuits like a pro on vacation.
After spending New Years with her new boyfriend Levi Meaden, the Modern Family actress and her friends headed off to Bora Bora. They’ve been enjoying a great holiday of fun and lots of sun ever since.
While we haven’t seen much of Winter since the new year began, she has finally returned to Instagram with a sexy and chic bathing suit shot. On Friday t he Los Angeles native posted a sassy picture of her rocking a simple black one-piece suit while hanging out in a boat.
@jackgriffo 
A photo posted by ARIEL WINTER (@arielwinter) on Jan 6, 2017 at 7:49pm PST 
Winter looked both sophisticated and sexy in this classic one-piece and it’s giving us major style goals.
While this is the first picture the young actress posted from her vacation, her friends have been posting up a storm.
Jack Griffo, shared a gorgeous picture of “The girls” on Thursday and again Winter looked perfect. The girls @arielwinter @jessiebergg 
A photo posted by Jack Griffo (@jackgriffo) on Jan 4, 2017 at 9:41am PST 
We’re kind of obsessed with this tropical look the Sophia the First star is wearing here. She looks like a island goddess with her brown two-piece and flower head piece. Oh, and that water…can we go to Bora Bora right now?! 
In addition to Griffo and Winter, fellow Modern Family star Nolan Gould, and Disney actor Luke Benward were seen living it up in the tropical destination.
Boys of Bora Bora. Bout to lock it down 
A photo posted by Jack Griffo (@jackgriffo) on Jan 3, 2017 at 11:05am PST 
We know it’s winter, but we’d much rather be living like the LA lady and her pals right now!
